title: What Cadillac's delayed F1 engine really means
summary: General Motors has pushed back its F1 entry as an engine supplier to 2029, but what does it mean?

qa_pairs.question: Which year is General Motors planning to enter Formula 1 as an engine supplier?
What major automotive company is set to supply engines to Formula 1 in 2029?
What impact might a delayed entry of an engine supplier like General Motors have on the F1 teams?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It could affect competitive balance and engine supply options.
wrong_options: It will have no impact on the teams.
It guarantees more competitive engines for all teams.
It ensures that all teams use the same engine model.
